%%{IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController}}}%%
flowchart TB
    subgraph UserInput[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        Chat[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        Voice[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        Context[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    end
    
    subgraph CoPilot[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        direction TB
        
        subgraph Router[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
            IntentClassifier[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
            ContextBuilder[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        end
        
        subgraph MCPLayer[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
            MCPClient[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
            
            subgraph RAGServer[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
                Search[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
                Lookup[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
                GetContext[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
            end
            
            subgraph RTEServer[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
                ProtoLookup[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
                ProtoSearch[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
                DecodePacket[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
                AnalyzeTraffic[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
            end
            
            subgraph ToolsServer[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
                CalcTraining[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
                CalcMarch[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
                CalcCombat[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
                CalcResources[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
                CalcBuilding[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
            end
        end
        
        subgraph LLMLayer[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
            LMStudio[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
            PromptBuilder[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
            ResponseParser[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        end
    end
    
    subgraph Output[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        TextResponse[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        ActionSuggestion[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        DataVisualization[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        ProtocolAction[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    end
    
    %% Input Flow
    Chat --> IntentClassifier
    Voice --> IntentClassifier
    Context --> ContextBuilder
    
    %% Intent Classification
    IntentClassifier -->|"Knowledge Query"| Search
    IntentClassifier -->|"Specific Topic"| Lookup
    IntentClassifier -->|"Game Situation"| GetContext
    IntentClassifier -->|"Protocol Question"| ProtoLookup
    IntentClassifier -->|"Find Protocol"| ProtoSearch
    IntentClassifier -->|"Decode Data"| DecodePacket
    IntentClassifier -->|"Traffic Analysis"| AnalyzeTraffic
    IntentClassifier -->|"Training Calc"| CalcTraining
    IntentClassifier -->|"March Time"| CalcMarch
    IntentClassifier -->|"Combat Sim"| CalcCombat
    IntentClassifier -->|"Resource Calc"| CalcResources
    IntentClassifier -->|"Building Calc"| CalcBuilding
    IntentClassifier -->|"General Chat"| PromptBuilder
    
    %% MCP to Context
    Search --> ContextBuilder
    Lookup --> ContextBuilder
    GetContext --> ContextBuilder
    ProtoLookup --> ContextBuilder
    ProtoSearch --> ContextBuilder
    DecodePacket --> ContextBuilder
    AnalyzeTraffic --> ContextBuilder
    CalcTraining --> ContextBuilder
    CalcMarch --> ContextBuilder
    CalcCombat --> ContextBuilder
    CalcResources --> ContextBuilder
    CalcBuilding --> ContextBuilder
    
    %% LLM Processing
    ContextBuilder --> PromptBuilder
    PromptBuilder --> LMStudio
    LMStudio --> ResponseParser
    
    %% Output
    ResponseParser --> TextResponse
    ResponseParser --> ActionSuggestion
    ResponseParser --> DataVisualization
    ResponseParser --> ProtocolAction
    
    %% Styling
    classDef input fill:#6366f1,stroke:#818cf8,color:#fff
    classDef router fill:#f59e0b,stroke:#fbbf24,color:#000
    classDef mcp fill:#ec4899,stroke:#f472b6,color:#fff
    classDef llm fill:#10b981,stroke:#34d399,color:#fff
    classDef output fill:#8b5cf6,stroke:#a78bfa,color:#fff
    
    class Chat,Voice,Context input
    class IntentClassifier,ContextBuilder router
    class MCPClient,Search,Lookup,GetContext,ProtoLookup,ProtoSearch,DecodePacket,AnalyzeTraffic,CalcTraining,CalcMarch,CalcCombat,CalcResources,CalcBuilding mcp
    class LMStudio,PromptBuilder,ResponseParser llm
    class TextResponse,ActionSuggestion,DataVisualization,ProtocolAction output
